english: goodbye (when you don't expect to see them soon)
mr/mrs (generic formal marker for names and titles)

japanese: ご馳(ち)走(そう)様(さま)でした

english: I'm going, I'll go and come back
take care (lit: please go and come back)

japanese: 宜(よろ)しくお願(ねが)いします
english: best regards, lit: "I humbly request your favour"

japanese: 何(なん)歳(さい)に見(み)えますか

english: Excuse me but..., I'm sorry but...
